p: Chikungunya virus (CHIKV): Togaviridae is the causal agent of chikungunya fever (CHIKF) ( Figure 1), known for producing an antalgic stance gait with severe articular pain [ 39]. Infected patients evolving to the chronic stage may range from 1.4% to 90% (52% in the American continent) [ 39]. Numerous outbreaks have recently been reported in several countries [ 30, 40, 41, 42].
